SLAM实用工具存档

zxl19 2021-05-25
  • SLAM
  • Archive

一些在SLAM研究过程中发现的实用工具存档，包括传感器标定、rosbag处理、数据标注、SLAM算法相关内容。

传感器相关

激光雷达数据生成

  1. hku-mars/MARSIM
  2. MartinHahner/LiDAR_fog_sim
  3. SysCV/LiDAR_snow_sim
  4. PJLab-ADG/LiDARSimLib-and-Placement-Evaluation
  5. xiaoaoran/SynLiDAR
  6. ntnu-arl/lidar_simulator
  7. trripy/CARLA_ROS_SLAM
  8. UMich-BipedLab/lidar_simulator

激光雷达内参标定

  1. UMich-BipedLab/LiDAR_intrinsic_calibration

相机内参标定

  1. zhiyuanyou/Calibration-ZhangZhengyou-Method
  2. kushalvyas/CameraCalibration
  3. yxlao/camtools
  4. GREAT-WHU/gv_tools

IMU噪声评估

  1. gaowenliang/imu_utils
  2. ccny-ros-pkg/imu_tools
  3. rpng/kalibr_allan
  4. Kyle-ak/imu_tk
  5. XinLiGH/GyroAllan
  6. LiquidCGS/FastIMU
  7. pcdangio/ros-calibration_imu
